structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.catch_line: Interrelationship of offices for administrative purposes.
law.text: The Kentucky Law Enforcement Council shall be attached to the office of the commissioner, Department of Criminal Justice Training for administrative purposes.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 16, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 11. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 9.
